channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Connect Direct for Microsoft Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Connect Direct for Microsoft Windows

item.title: CVE-2020-4767|2024-09-16T17:59:04.447Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%20direct%20for%20microsoft%20windows
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect Direct for Microsoft Windows 4.7, 4.8, 6.0, and 6.1 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service, caused by a buffer over-read. Bysending a specially crafted request, the attacker could cause the application to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 188906.
